Name: IT Cyber Security Engineer
Description: Job Description Do you have an interest in joining reputable companies that you can trust will be thriving in the next 20 years? This local investment firm with an office based in Cherry Hill, NJ is offering exactly that! They are looking to bring in a cyber security focused professional with a strong background in network/infrastructure. This role will not necessarily be a network security role, rather a role based around network AND security. The official title is for an IT Cyber Security Engineer. This company offers it's employees the tools, space, and environment to be the best versions of themselves! On the networking side, they need someone who can help wrap up an ongoing project of migrating their firewalls to Palo Alto. From there, you will be in constant communication with the infrastructure team as you'll be working side by side with them. Once completed, the focus of the role will shift into more of a defensive security role. They need someone with experience in vulnerability management which would include actively remediating any threats, risks or vulnerabilities. You would join a team of 4 others, 2 engineers and 2 analysts. You will be expected to harden the company's security posture by writing and implementing policies/procedures/frameworks as well. Of course you will be using the top tools like Splunk for their SIEM, Nessus for scanning and AWS for their cloud environment.
